Welcome to GenomeSpy's documentation!
===================================

GenomeSpy is a Python wrapper to the GPU-powered Javascript visualization grammar library GenomeSpy.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   quickstart
   api
   examples
   contributing

Installation
-----------

To install GenomeSpy, run this command in your terminal:

.. code-block:: console

   $ pip install genomespy
